home.featuredSubtitle: Five cozy apartments in prime location
home.aboutSnippetText: Little in size, big in heart. Our cozy apartments (85 sqm) offer authentic Swiss hospitality in the heart of Interlaken. Just steps away from train stations, restaurants, and adventure activities.
home.whyUsSubtitle: Little in size, big in heart
home.feature1Text: 200m from Interlaken West station, right between Lake Thun and Lake Brienz
home.feature2Text: Professional cleaning, modern amenities, attention to detail
home.feature3Text: 85 sqm with all comforts: kitchen, bathroom, WiFi, washing machine
home.feature4Text: Diana, Superhost since 2016, responds in under 1 hour
home.feature5Text: Jungfraujoch, hiking, skiing, paragliding - all nearby
home.whyInterlakenTitle: Your Gateway to the Swiss Alps
home.whyInterlakenText: Nestled between Lake Thun and Lake Brienz, Interlaken is the adventure capital of Switzerland. From our doorstep, you can easily reach world-famous destinations like Jungfraujoch, Grindelwald, and countless hiking trails - all while enjoying the charm of a traditional Swiss town.

diana.title: Your Host Diana
diana.intro: With passion and over 9 years of experience, I warmly welcome you to my guesthouse. As an Airbnb Superhost, my guests' well-being is close to my heart.
diana.quote: Nature fan, family person, like in and on the water, biking, cooking and always happy with friends

reviews.title: What Our Guests Say
reviews.review1Text: The property was centrally located in the city center and was a close walk to Interlaken West train station. There were several restaurants right nearby and an amazing view right off the balcony!
reviews.review2Text: The cleanliness, furniture quality, and vintage charm of the place all contribute to a great overall experience.
reviews.review3Text: Perfect location, modern amenities, and Diana was incredibly helpful. Will definitely return!

apartment.guesthouseDescription: This apartment is part of our carefully curated collection of 5 cozy apartments in the heart of Interlaken.
apartment.hostBio: Superhost with 9+ years of experience welcoming guests to Interlaken. Passionate about nature, family, and ensuring every guest feels at home.

about.title: About Little Heart Guesthouse
about.subtitle: Little in size, big in heart
about.storyText: In the heart of Interlaken, surrounded by the majestic Swiss Alps, lies Little Heart Guesthouse. What began as Diana's dream to welcome travelers from around the world has grown into one of Interlaken's most beloved guesthouses. Awarded as an Airbnb Superhost since 2016, we combine Swiss quality with warm hospitality.
about.dianaQuote: Nature, family, and happy guests - that's my passion.
about.dianaText: With over 1,400 delighted guests and 9 years of experience as a Superhost, I understand travelers' needs. My goal: that you feel at home with us. When I'm not helping my guests, you'll find me mountain biking, swimming, or cooking for friends.
about.value1Text: Swiss standards in everything we do
about.value2Text: Personal service, not just a check-in code
about.ctaText: Browse our collection of apartments and find your perfect home base in the Swiss Alps.
about.whoWeAreText: Little Heart Guesthouse offers a collection of carefully curated apartments in the heart of Interlaken, Switzerland. We are dedicated to providing our guests with comfortable, modern accommodations that serve as the perfect base for exploring the stunning Jungfrau region.
about.whyInterlakenText: Nestled between Lake Thun and Lake Brienz, Interlaken is the adventure capital of Switzerland. From here, you can easily access world-famous destinations like Jungfraujoch, Grindelwald, and countless hiking trails, all while enjoying the charm of a traditional Swiss town.
about.ourPromiseText: Each of our apartments is thoughtfully equipped with modern amenities while maintaining the warmth and comfort of a home away from home. We take pride in ensuring every guest has an unforgettable stay in the Swiss Alps.
about.activity3: Cruise on Lake Thun or Lake Brienz

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.bookingNote: For booking inquiries, please visit our apartment listings on Airbnb.

seo.homeTitle: Little Heart Guesthouse | Cozy Apartments in Interlaken, Switzerland
seo.homeDescription: Discover 5 cozy apartments in central Interlaken, perfect for exploring the Swiss Alps and Jungfrau region. Superhost since 2016. Little in size, big in heart.
seo.apartmentsDescription: Browse our collection of 5 cozy apartments in central Interlaken. Air conditioning, elevator access, and walking distance to train stations.
seo.aboutDescription: Learn about Little Heart Guesthouse and meet Diana, your Superhost since 2016. Little in size, big in heart.
seo.contactDescription: Get in touch with Little Heart Guesthouse. Book your stay in Interlaken, Switzerland.
